Name: Evolution Tale
About the game: Collect materials and advance through different stages of history to get to the modern ages. Explore 8 wonderful worlds full of life where you can collect plants, cut trees or mine precious stones to craft new tools and discover new items. You'll find a variety of almost 500 items which you can then use to craft new combinations and evolve through the ages.
